args.name: code
args.description: The code to execute when cron triggers

args.name: schedule
args.description: Cron schedule expression (e.g., '0 0 * * *' for daily at midnight)

name: $deleteCron
description: Deletes a scheduled cron job by its ID or name

args.name: jobId
args.description: The ID or name of the cron job to delete
